about_the_game:
Nanomon is the ultimate desktop pet!

Born from the bits and bytes coalescing in the back of cyberspace, every Nanomon needs a good home. This is your opportunity to give them one! From flying cats to sentient watermelon to pixelated dragons to foliage bearing locked-and-loaded weaponry, every Nanomon has a unique appeal. Find your new friend today!

Every Nanomon has a goal in life. A dream that only you can help them achieve. If you want them to evolve to their full potential, you’ll have to help them become the strongest. Become a star. Or maybe just become the best chef in the Nanoscape, who knows?

If you wanna be the very best (like no one ever was,) you can hone your Nanomon into a fierce fighter! Battle your friends online, duke it out with your best Nanomon, see who has what it takes to win!

But when you’re hard at work and just looking to relax, maybe you just want to hang out and play with your best friend down at the bottom of your screen. Dive into a dungeon, head out fishing, or just play stickball with your ride-or-die Nanomon bud. When you need a break, they’re always there to just chill.

The Nanoscape is a massive world that fits into a tiny window in the corner of your screen. Your Nanomon craves adventure! Exploring new locations, finding new trinkets, eating new meals, and… doing its business. All Nanomon are curious and inquisitive, so make sure you follow their sense of adventure!
detailed_description:
Feature List



🥚 Raise a unique Nanomon in the style of classic digital pet games

🍖 Feed them exotic foods to discover new evolutions

🧭 Uncover the Nanoscape, inspired by Adventure Time, Digimon, and Tamagotchi

🎣 Play games with your Nanomon like Fishing, Stick-ball, and Dungeon-diving

🥊 Fight in fast-paced battles while exploring the world

short_description: Nanomon are tiny, virtual pets who hang out in the corner of your screen. Train, explore, discover, and play with your Nanomon so they can evolve into the perfect companion! Only the best, most attentive trainers will help their Nanomon achieve their life goal!
